columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the deployment group

columns.name: application_name
columns.description: The application name.

columns.name: deployment_config_name
columns.description: The deployment configuration name.

columns.name: deployment_group_id
columns.description: The deployment group ID.

columns.name: deployment_group_name
columns.description: The name of the deployment group.

columns.name: service_role_arn
columns.description: A service role Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that grants CodeDeploy permission to make calls to Amazon Web Services services on your behalf.

columns.name: alarm_configuration
columns.description: A list of alarms associated with the deployment group.

columns.name: auto_rollback_configuration
columns.description: Information about the automatic rollback configuration associated with the deployment group.

columns.name: auto_scaling_groups
columns.description: A list of associated Auto Scaling groups.

columns.name: blue_green_deployment_configuration
columns.description: Information about blue/green deployment options for a deployment group.

columns.name: compute_platform
columns.description: The destination platform type for the deployment (Lambda, Server, or ECS).

columns.name: deployment_style
columns.description: Information about the type of deployment, either in-place or blue/green, you want to run and whether to route deployment traffic behind a load balancer.

columns.name: ec2_tag_filters
columns.description: The Amazon EC2 tags on which to filter. The deployment group includes EC2 instances with any of the specified tags.

columns.name: ec2_tag_set
columns.description: Information about groups of tags applied to an Amazon EC2 instance.

columns.name: ecs_services
columns.description: The target Amazon ECS services in the deployment group.

columns.name: last_attempted_deployment
columns.description: Information about the most recent attempted deployment to the deployment group.

columns.name: last_successful_deployment
columns.description: Information about the most recent successful deployment to the deployment group.

columns.name: load_balancer_info
columns.description: Information about the load balancer to use in a deployment.

columns.name: on_premises_instance_tag_filters
columns.description: The on-premises instance tags on which to filter.

columns.name: on_premises_tag_set
columns.description: Information about groups of tags applied to an on-premises instance.

columns.name: outdated_instances_strategy
columns.description: Indicates what happens when new Amazon EC2 instances are launched mid-deployment and do not receive the deployed application revision.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with deployment group.

columns.name: target_revision
columns.description: Information about the deployment group's target revision, including type and location.

columns.name: trigger_configurations
columns.description: Information about triggers associated with the deployment group.
